issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Move preemption related tests from TestFairScheduler to TestFairSchedulerPreemption

This message was automatically generated.
[~ozawa] The failed tests cannot be reproduced. Could you rerun them please?
[~lewuathe], sure, I'll check this on this weekend.

[~kaisasak] Instead of changing the sequence of initialization, how about changing the name of {{startResourceManagerWithoutThreshold}}? I think the name of {{startResourceManagerWithoutThreshold}} looks confusing since 
the behaviour of the method named {{startResourceManagerWithoutThreshold()}} looks to be equals to startResourceManager(1.1f). What do you think?

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |

This message was automatically generated.

[~lewuathe] Thank you for updating. Unfortunatelly, startResourceManagerForPreemptionTest is still confusing because the name of the class is TestFairSchedulerPreemption. 

My suggestion is to rename startResourceManager to startResourceManagerWithStubbedFairScheduler, and startResourceManagerForPreemptionTest to startResourceManagerWithRealFairScheduler. Do you have any better idea?
[~ozawa] That naming much better, I also think. I'll update. Thanks!

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
